page.title: 12LONG MYND
page.content: Here I am sitting on the{Longmynd}with the sun beaming down on me.I watch the rabbits play, leaping the heather as they go.The sheep are grazing still and{quiet.Let's be still}and listen to the horses in the fields,the munching of the sheep and the trickle of the stream as it flows down the valley. Suddenly the animals look up in{alarm as a fox slowly prowls out of the wood.I look up and all the animals have run away,all except for a little baby rabbit who looks all around in astonishment.Then just in time he scurries down his hole to hide. Then all is silent except for the droning in the far distance of the combine harvester.
